verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}My life will be an eternal song, Containing just one chord. The sweetest note Iâ€™ve ever heard, Is Jesus Christ my Lord.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Hallelujah, hallelujah, Hallelujah, hallelujah, To my Lord. Hallelujah, hallelujah, Hallelujah, hallelujah, To my Lord.{/lang-eng}
